This series was helmed by Ian Kelly and Davide Serino. It is based […] The post Is There a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 Release Date & Time? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Wondering if there's a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time? Find out the answer to your question from this guide.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Viewers are wondering if there’s a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time. This is because they have seen all eight episodes of Carême and are eager to dive into more adventures featuring Antonin Carême and his thrilling espionage work. This series was helmed by Ian Kelly and Davide Serino. It is based on the life of a Napoleonic-era chef of the same name. Here’s all you need to know. Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time explained There isn’t a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time. This is because the first season of the series has ended with its eighth episode. As of this writing, there’s no official word on whether Carême has been renewed for a second installment. Carême follows the life of Antonin Carême, who was born during the French Revolution. Hailing from poverty, Carême begins a journey into the world of spycraft and espionage, where he uses his natural talents in seduction and determining good food to get himself out of troubling and sticky situations. Moreover, during his espionage journey, Carême ends up crossing paths with numerous prominent historical figures like the Rothschilds, Tsar Alexander, and Napoleon. Has Carême Season 1 ended? Yes, Carême Season 1 has finished. The reason it has concluded is because the final and eighth episodes of the first season have aired. Carême Season 1 Episode 8 titled “The Coronation,” premiered on June 10, 2025, in the United States and June 11, worldwide. In this episode, Carême prepared to make a daring meal for a lavish and massive feast presided over by Emperor Napoleon. Where to watch previous Carême Season 1 episodes You can watch Carême Season 1 via Apple TV Plus. Apple TV Plus is a streaming service owned and operated by Apple Inc. The platform provides subscribers with a wide variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages. Users can subscribe to Apple TV Plus via its dedicated application or online website. An Apple TV Plus subscription costs $9.99/month after a seven-day free trial period. The series synopsis reads: “Witness the rise of the world’s first celebrity chef, Antonin Carême, and his descent into espionage in Napoleon-era France—where manipulation is king. With his gifts for gastronomy and seduction, he becomes the perfect weapon in a fight for power.”
html:
Viewers are wondering if there’s a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time. This is because they have seen all eight episodes of Carême and are eager to dive into more adventures featuring Antonin Carême and his thrilling espionage work. This series was helmed by Ian Kelly and Davide Serino. It is based on the life of a Napoleonic-era chef of the same name.

Here’s all you need to know.

Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time explained

There isn’t a Carême Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time. This is because the first season of the series has ended with its eighth episode.

As of this writing, there’s no official word on whether Carême has been renewed for a second installment.

Carême follows the life of Antonin Carême, who was born during the French Revolution. Hailing from poverty, Carême begins a journey into the world of spycraft and espionage, where he uses his natural talents in seduction and determining good food to get himself out of troubling and sticky situations. Moreover, during his espionage journey, Carême ends up crossing paths with numerous prominent historical figures like the Rothschilds, Tsar Alexander, and Napoleon.

Has Carême Season 1 ended?

Yes, Carême Season 1 has finished. The reason it has concluded is because the final and eighth episodes of the first season have aired.

Carême Season 1 Episode 8 titled “The Coronation,” premiered on June 10, 2025, in the United States and June 11, worldwide. In this episode, Carême prepared to make a daring meal for a lavish and massive feast presided over by Emperor Napoleon.

Where to watch previous Carême Season 1 episodes

You can watch Carême Season 1 via Apple TV Plus.

Apple TV Plus is a streaming service owned and operated by Apple Inc. The platform provides subscribers with a wide variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages.

Users can subscribe to Apple TV Plus via its dedicated application or online website. An Apple TV Plus subscription costs $9.99/month after a seven-day free trial period.

The series synopsis reads:

“Witness the rise of the world’s first celebrity chef, Antonin Carême, and his descent into espionage in Napoleon-era France—where manipulation is king. With his gifts for gastronomy and seduction, he becomes the perfect weapon in a fight for power.”
